name: Island Flight Simulator
description: Come fly the friendly skies and prove yourself as a freight pilot on twelve exotic islands.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win XP/Vista/7/8 Processor: Dual Core 2,4 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB

reviews.review_text: This is a fun game, but it is plagued by several bugs and is lacking in features.   What I Like

I figured out the controls by hitting all the keys on my keyboard.  I took off. Island disappeared.  I flew back. Island reappeared.  I landed. No brakes.  Clipped through hangar..  Hit a bush.  Exploded.  Exited to see how much I paid for the game.
